comment.author: 45586426@N06
comment._content: Highly decorated and distinctively marked Douglas F4D-1 Skyray. VFAW-3. White tail code PA. Black ‘Modex’ nose code 25. ‘Last four’ of serial number across base of rudder ‘4967’. Radome overpainted light gull gray and white. With one other VFAW-3 F4D-1 behind. VFAW-3 stationed at NAS North Island, San Diego, California. Wheels chocked and aircraft secured to ramp with cables. Thus aircraft is Bu No 134967. A color profile of 134967 can be viewed here: wp.scn.ru/en/ww3/f/814/3/5/4 VFAW-3, US Navy Serial: 25/PA (BuNo.134967) Probably one of the most colorful Skyray squadrons around, VFAW-3 from North Island painted their F4Ds up in this nice scheme. The number of yellow stars varied from plane to plane, most likely depending on what kind of day it was in the paint shop. The above 'flickr' picture may have come from here: www.aero-web.org/database/aircraft/getimage.htm?id=13909 'VFAW-3 NAS North Island - San Diego, CA. 1958' As yet there is no other known web based info available on 134967.
